message: i think this is s must-read for any Front-end developer, if you have a project where you are requested to disable a standard user interaction like right-click or pasting for "security Reasons" please take time to consider if this "annoyance" you are inflecting on your users really worth it
story: Mohamed Abdel Aty shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: The “Cobra Effect” that is disabling paste on password fields
caption: troyhunt.com
description: Back in the day when the British had a penchant for conquering the world, they ran into a little problem on the subcontinent; cobras. Turns out there were a hell of a lot of the buggers wandering around India and it also turned out that they were rather venomous which
